name: Barry and Stan: BFFs 4 Ever!
description:
This is a proof of concept I made for myself to test out a theme. I wanted to see if, after implementing it, I still thought cute animals getting murdered in order to have their body parts harvested and sacrificed to Satan... I mean Stan.

There are plenty of bugs and horrible design flaws in this build that I will rectify in the future should I want to continue this project. Also I haven't added any sound yet.

Here are some gifs:

https://gfycat.com/BountifulZigzagIrishterrier

https://gfycat.com/MisguidedSecondaryGavial

https://gfycat.com/LikableGlassAmericantoad

https://gfycat.com/MadShockedBull

Controls:

WASD - Move

1 - Equip/Unequip weapon

Left Mouse - Attack

E - Sacrifice body parts to the alter

Space - Jump for joy

To harvest body parts: continue to attack penguins you've killed. (They have a total of 4 body parts each you can harvest)
